workshoptitle: EBS SSO using OCI IAM Identity Domains

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stacks and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Deploy ORM stack to create EBS, EBS Asserter and Identity Domain
tutorials.description: How to use the stack to deploy the resources

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a confidential application in OCI IAM
tutorials.description: Labs that helps to create a confidential application in OCI IAM to invoke the REST APIs in the configure stack

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deploy ORM stack to configure EBS Asserter and Identity Domain
tutorials.description: Labs that helps to configure the instances of EBS Asserter and Identity Domains

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Prepare EBS application
tutorials.description: Labs that helps to create site profiles in EBS application and creating an user

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Validate the SSO flow
tutorials.description: Labs that helps to validate the SSO flow

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Environment Cleanup
tutorials.description: Labs that helps to cleanup the used resources

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
